Belorussian Preparatory Committee Formed
articles.content:
Belorussian Preparatory Committee Formed 
    Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) --A Belorussian preparatory committee for commemorating the Day of the Sun was formed on April 2 with due ceremony in Minsk.
 The chairman and the vice-chairman of the committee were elected there.    
 The committee decided to hold a rally, adopt a message of greetings to leader Kim Jong Il and have memorial articles carried in papers on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

Kim Jong Il Sends Wreath to Bier of Kim Jong Ho
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Sends Wreath to Bier of Kim Jong Ho 
    Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il on April 7 sent a wreath to the bier of Kim Jong Ho, secretary of the Primary Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea of the State Bureau for the Assessment of Prices who is winner of "Kim Il Sung Order," expressing deep condolences over his death.

Foreign Art Troupes, Delegations and Marathoners Here
articles.content:
Foreign Art Troupes, Delegations and Marathoners Here
    Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- An art troupe of Koreans in Australia, an art troupe of the Japan-Korea Musical and Artistic Interchange Society, and a cultural delegation of Yanji, China, arrived here Wednesday to participate in the 22nd April Spring Friendship Art Festival.
 Marathoners of South Africa, Norway, Ethiopia, Botswana, China, Kenya and Poland arrived here on April 6 and 7 to take part in the 17th International Marathon Race for Mangyongdae Cup scheduled on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Il from Military Attaches' Corps
articles.content:
Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Il from Military Attaches' Corps
    Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA)-- The military attaches' corps in Pyongyang sent a congratulatory letter to leader Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the 11th anniversary of his election as chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
 It was conveyed to an official concerned today by Abdullah Hamidi Benam, military attach of the Iranian embassy here, who is doyen of the corps.

articles.title: Air Line Agreement Signed between DPRK and Czech Republic
articles.content:
Air Line Agreement Signed between DPRK and Czech Republic
    Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- An agreement on air lines between the governments of the DPRK and the Czech Republic was signed with due ceremony in Pyongyang today.
 Present at the ceremony were Kim Pong Hyon, deputy director general of the DPRK Civil Aviation Administration, and officials concerned from the DPRK side and members of a delegation of the Czech Ministry of Transportation headed by Vice-minister Jifi Kubinek from the opposite side.

articles.title: DPRK Government Cultural Delegation Leaves for Cuba
articles.content:
DPRK Government Cultural Delegation Leaves for Cuba
    Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- A DPRK government cultural delegation led by Mun Jae Chol, acting chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, left here today to visit Cuba.
 It was seen off at the airport by Jon Hyon Chan, vice-chairman of the committee, and Esteban Lobaina Romero, Cuban ambassador to the DPRK.
